TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, but you walk with him in timewarp, thus killing him.

I wish to remember to add this 2nd portion more often.

Granted, however, you always forget the first bit.

I wish I could find the time to play more

Edited October 8, 2013 by Lazro

Granted, but you all you play is Russian roulette.

I wish for laser weapons.

Granted, you play russian roulette with them

I wish for peace in the world

Granted. It lasts for exactly twelve seconds, enjoy them.

I wish for a way to test explosive decompression.

Granted it explodes.

I wish that Laythe have a moon.

Granted.

I wish that memes could control people

Granted.

-snip-

I wish that memes could control people

Granted.

World War 3 starts.

I wish more money was put into space exploration by all major superpowers.

Granted, all the money is put in space program and everything else is under funded.

I wish for an old NES

Granted, but no new games are made.

I wish for vectors.

Granted,but now they are useless.

I wish I could stop using invisible text.

It's serious,I'm addicted!

Granted, Everyone but you uses it. forever.

I wish for mo' money.

Granted, you get 1 cent

I wish for free internet
Granted. you're stuck with the people who make those hopelessly idiotic facebook posts.
You know, usually one also posts a wish...

Granted, the Kraken attacks you.

I wish that this wish gets corrupted.

Granted,

I wish it would snow here already.

Granted, it snows molasses.

I wish that I did not need to take a break from games to continue to enjoy them.

granted, but you can't take breaks at all, wasting your entire existence on games.

I wish for fewer essay exams.

I...I... can't corrupted that... granted(we can hope)

I wish for less homework

granted, you get no practice and fail the test.

I wish for less physics labs.

Granted, you lose all the physics knowledge to play KSP.

I wish to learn airsoft.

Granted, you learned air is not a hard, rigid substance. Good for you.

I wish I could find the time to feed the fish.

Granted, the fish eat you

I wish to be able to hug a pink fluffy unicorn

Granted, but you can never let go

I wish to have a better computer to play KSP on.
